infobox.Japanese title:: 連れ去られたコナン  (Tsuresarareta Konan)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi  Juzo Megure  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  913: Keiko Sasaki  914: Kenichi Otomo
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Hiroaki Hirata as Iwao Takatori  Takanori Hoshino as Tokuro Utsumi  Tomokazu Koshimura as Setsuo Yamaga  Kosuke Meguro as Teruaki Shimazu

sections.Trivia:
- According to Detective Conan producer Michihiko Suwa, during the writing stage of the script, the script of the episode had The Deduction That Was Force-stopped (推理、強制シャットダウン ,Suiri, Kyōsei Shattodaun?) as a subtitle because Conan forces Kogoro to stop his deduction at some point in the episode[1].
- There is a prodution mistake in Part 1 when, as Iwao Takatori's car exit the hangar, two cars in the parking disappear (there were three Toyota Crowns and two Toyota HiMedic but a Toyota Crown and a Toyota HiMedic disappeared).
- Different cars include:
Iwao Takatori's Kona Blue Metallic Ford Shelby GT 500 SVT 2007 [S197] with the license plate being 新宿 331, た 35-27 (Shinjuku 331, Ta 35-27).
Polices cars in the hangar Toyota Crown Sedan 2012 (license plates 新宿 800, ふ 16-35 and another one has the same has the ones in The Job Request from Inspector Megure, Mystery of the Burning Tent, and The Detective Boys Become Models).
Police's Nissan Skyline (license plate 新宿 33, た 13-79)
White Honda Inspire CP3 2012 in underground parking (license plate 新宿 ???, ? 13-75)
Red Toyota Prius V 2014 in underground parking (license plate 新宿 ???, ? 68-20)
White Nissan Cube Z11 2008 in underground parking
Blue Honda Fit GE7 2014 in underground parking
Black Nissan Elgrand E51 2010 in underground parking (license plate 新宿 ???, ? 37-45)
Iwao Takatori's stolen Daytona Yellow Chevrolet Camaro SS 1969 (license plate 新宿 330, とTo 50-63).
Marine Blue Subaru Impreza GT Sedan 2017 on the highway (license plate 新宿 30, ぐGu 13-79)
Koba Taxi car #567 green and yellow Toyota Crown.
Koba Taxi green and yellow Toyota Crown (license plate 新宿 ???, ? 47-09).
Parked Nissan Cube 2015 (license plate 新宿 520, とTo 57-64).
Chiba's White Toyota Prius V 2015 (license plate 新宿 ???, ? 6-24).
Shimazu's Bianco Luna Metallizzato Ferrari 206 GT 1966 (License plate 新宿 55, ふFu 2-06).
White Isuzu Forward transportation truck.

- This Episode have the Flight Travel from Airport Airlines
Canada (CAN) Flight CZ380 (China Southern Airlines).
Hong Kong (HKG) Flight NH1191 (All Nippon Airways), CX533/CX535 and CX531 (Cathay Pacific).
Taipei (TPE) Flight JL821 (Japan Airlines), CI151 (China Airlines).
- Canada (CAN) Flight CZ380 (China Southern Airlines).

- The Romain painting in Setsuo Yamaga's apartment is from Nichiuri TV in The Most Useful School in the World Case, Amamiya Residence in The Detective Boys Get Out of the Rain, and Takizawa Residence in The Beauty, The Lies, and The Secrets, and reappears in an apartment from A Woman Standing by the Window.
